prayerPoint: Lord, create in me a clean heart and renew a right spirit within me. Wash me thoroughly from my iniquity and cleanse me from my sin.
scripture: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.

prayerPoint: Father, I ask that You would purify my heart and mind. Help me to pursue purity in all areas of my life.
scripture: Blessed are the pure in heart: for they shall see God.

prayerPoint: Lord, help me to fix my thoughts on what is true, honorable, right, pure, lovely, and admirable.
scripture: Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.

prayerPoint: Father, cleanse me from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit, and help me to perfect holiness in Your fear.
scripture: Having therefore these promises, dearly beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.

prayerPoint: Lord, wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow. Purge me with hyssop and I shall be clean.
scripture: Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.

prayerPoint: Jesus, You said that whom the Son sets free is free indeed. I receive my freedom from this bondage in Your name.
scripture: If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.

prayerPoint: Father, deliver me from every evil work and preserve me for Your heavenly kingdom.
scripture: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

prayerPoint: Lord, I stand in the liberty by which Christ has made me free. I refuse to be entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
scripture: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

prayerPoint: God, I know that where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty. Set me free by Your Spirit.
scripture: Now the Lord is that Spirit: and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.

prayerPoint: Father, break every chain of addiction and bondage in my life. Let Your truth make me free.
scripture: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.

prayerPoint: Lord, You promised a way of escape from every temptation. Show me the way out and give me strength to take it.
scripture: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.

prayerPoint: Father, I submit myself to You. Help me to resist the devil so that he will flee from me.
scripture: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

prayerPoint: Lord, strengthen me with might by Your Spirit in my inner man, that I may stand firm against temptation.
scripture: That he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man.

prayerPoint: God, I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. Give me the power to overcome this weakness.
scripture: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

prayerPoint: Father, help me to put on the full armor of God so I can stand against the schemes of the devil.
scripture: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

prayerPoint: Lord, help me to flee youthful lusts and pursue righteousness, faith, love, and peace.
scripture: Flee also youthful lusts: but follow righteousness, faith, charity, peace, with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart.

prayerPoint: Father, I confess my sins to You. Forgive me and cleanse me from all unrighteousness.
scripture: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

prayerPoint: Lord, I thank You that there is no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
scripture: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

prayerPoint: God, Your grace is sufficient for me. Your strength is made perfect in my weakness.
scripture: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.

prayerPoint: Father, as far as the east is from the west, so far have You removed my transgressions from me.
scripture: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.

prayerPoint: Lord, help me to receive Your mercy and find grace to help in my time of need.
scripture: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.

prayerPoint: Father, restore to me the joy of Your salvation and uphold me with Your willing Spirit.
scripture: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.

prayerPoint: Lord, help me to be transformed by the renewing of my mind, that I may prove Your good and perfect will.
scripture: And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.

prayerPoint: God, make me a new creation in Christ. Let the old things pass away and all things become new.
scripture: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.

prayerPoint: Father, renew a steadfast spirit within me and keep me from falling back into my old ways.
scripture: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.

prayerPoint: Lord, help me to put off my old self and put on the new self, created to be like God in true righteousness and holiness.
scripture: And that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.

prayerPoint: Father, help me to take every thought captive to the obedience of Christ and cast down imaginations.
scripture: Casting down imaginations, and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God, and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ.

prayerPoint: Lord, I know my battle is not against flesh and blood but against spiritual forces. Equip me for this warfare.
scripture: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.

prayerPoint: God, give me the sword of the Spirit, which is Your Word, to fight against every temptation.
scripture: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.

prayerPoint: Father, greater is He who is in me than he who is in the world. Give me victory through Your power.
scripture: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

prayerPoint: Lord, help me to be sober and vigilant because my adversary the devil walks about seeking whom he may devour.
scripture: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour.

prayerPoint: Father, help me to walk in the Spirit so that I will not fulfill the lust of the flesh.
scripture: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.

prayerPoint: Lord, let me be a vessel of honor, sanctified and useful for the Master, prepared for every good work.
scripture: If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honour, sanctified, and meet for the master's use, and prepared unto every good work.

prayerPoint: God, You have not given me a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and a sound mind.
scripture: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.

prayerPoint: Father, help me to keep my eyes on things above, not on earthly things that lead me astray.
scripture: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

prayerPoint: Lord, I will not let sin reign in my mortal body. Help me to present myself to You as an instrument of righteousness.
scripture: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body, that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof.

prayerPoint: God, Your mercies are new every morning. Great is Your faithfulness toward me.
scripture: It is of the LORD's mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not. They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.

prayerPoint: Father, I overcome evil with good. Help me to focus on what is right and pure in Your sight.
scripture: Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.

prayerPoint: Lord, help me to abstain from fleshly lusts which war against my soul.
scripture: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul.

prayerPoint: Father, call upon You in the day of trouble, and You will deliver me, and I shall glorify You.
scripture: And call upon me in the day of trouble: I will deliver thee, and thou shalt glorify me.

prayerPoint: Lord, help me to make no provision for the flesh to fulfill its lusts.
scripture: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof.

prayerPoint: God, You are faithful and just. I trust in Your promise to forgive and cleanse me.
scripture: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

prayerPoint: Father, help me to forget what is behind and strain toward what is ahead, pressing on toward the goal.
scripture: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before.

prayerPoint: Lord, no weapon formed against me shall prosper. I stand on Your promises.
scripture: No weapon that is formed against thee shall prosper; and every tongue that shall rise against thee in judgment thou shalt condemn.

prayerPoint: Father, help me to keep myself pure and set apart for Your glory.
scripture: Keep thyself pure.

prayerPoint: Lord, You are my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer. In You I take refuge.
scripture: The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust.

prayerPoint: God, help me to stand firm and not be moved by temptation. Let my labor in the Lord not be in vain.
scripture: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord.

prayerPoint: Father, blot out my transgressions according to Your unfailing love and great compassion.
scripture: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.

prayerPoint: Lord, I wait on You to renew my strength. Help me to mount up with wings like eagles.
scripture: But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.

prayerPoint: Father, I am more than a conqueror through Him who loved me. Help me to walk in victory.
scripture: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
